package.name: Gimmie
package.summary: Giving out points and Gimmie rewards when user do action in board (e.g. post a new topic that contains word in settings or logging in to webboard).
package.description:
Giving out points and Gimmie rewards when user do action in board (e.g. post a new topic that contains word in settings or logging in to webboard).
User can - Enable or disabled it and change key for giving out different set of rewards. - Set which event that will trigger the event and give out points. Currently setting has login, post, create poll, vote poll. - Set keywords and board. So not user posts trigger points. - Notification popup and rewards view for redeeming rewards. - Rewards view include profile and leaderboard which can disable in settings. - CSS and popup text settings
